headline: North America RegTech Market Report 2025-2031, with Leading Player Profiles for Ascent Regtech, Broadridge Financial Solutions, Deloitte, IBM, Jumio, MetricStream, PWC, & Thomson Reuters
summary: The North America regtech market, valued at $2.79 billion in 2023, is projected to reach $15.99 billion by 2031 with a CAGR of 24.4%. Driven by the rise in financial cybercrimes, regtech solutions leverage AI and Big Data to combat fraud. Key segments include solutions and cloud deployment, with the US leading in market share.
